movies.title: Poseidon
movies.plot: A packed cruise ship traveling the Atlantic is hit and overturned by a massive wave, compelling the passengers to begin a dramatic fight for their lives.

events.title: the Poseidon is capsized by a rogue wave
guests on board the cruise ship Poseidon prepare to welcome in the New Year

movies.title: The Perfect Storm
movies.plot: In October 1991, a confluence of weather conditions combined to form a killer storm in the North Atlantic. Caught in the storm was the sword-fishing boat Andrea Gail. Magnificent foreshadowing and anticipation fill this true-life drama while minute details of the fishing boats, their gear and the weather are juxtaposed with the sea adventure.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 25 nominations.
